name: Egg Ball
description:
Play this weird football game with your friend !

Player 1

Move using WASD, U to throw the ball, I to punch the other player

Player 2

Move using the keys, 5 on the numpad to throw the ball, 6 to punch the other player

Punch the other player to make him drop the ball ! Throwing the eggball on the other player might stun him... Don't forget that you can double jump too !
